document_data.name: Thar Greenbough
document_data.mainbody: '''Thar Greenbough''' was a [[ranger]] living in the [[Rothé Valley]] near [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.History: Thar was the local agent of the [[Emerald Enclave]] in the Rothé Valley during the [[Tyranny of Dragons]]; he directed adventurers against the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the area, including the [[blue dragon]] [[Venfithar]].
